content.question: The persistence of the social and economic system illustrated by the passage contributed strongly to which of the following?

choices.label: High rates of mechanization in Russian agriculture
High rates of emigration from Russia
An increasing popularity of Utopian socialism among Russian peasants
An increasing productivity gap between Russia and industrialized Europe

content.answer: An increasing productivity gap between Russia and industrialized Europe

topic.text: 6.2: The Spread of Industry Throughout Europe

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
